snippet: Comments by the president’s that he shoots clay pigeons “all the time” at Camp David draw surprise — and skepticism.
abstract: Pres Obama mentions his new hobby is skeet shooting at Camp David, and White House releases photo of him shooting on range in August; notion of Obama shooting clay pigeons captivates some in political and social media worlds at time when he is pushing Congress to enact sweeping restrictions on high-capacity rifles and magazines.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and MARK LANDLER

lead_paragraph: Comments by the president’s that he shoots clay pigeons “all the time” at Camp David draw surprise — and skepticism.

headline.seo: White House Offers Evidence of Obama’s Shooting Hobby
headline.main: President Claims Shooting as a Hobby, and the White House Offers Evidence
headline.print_headline: President Claims Shooting as a Hobby, and the White House Offers Evidence
